argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | opsrring.o | |- O = ( ( I ordPwSer R ) ` T ) |
| 2 |  | opsrring.i | |- ( ph -> I e. V ) |
| 3 |  | opsrring.r | |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) |
| 4 |  | opsrring.t | |- ( ph -> T C_ ( I X. I ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( I mPwSer R ) = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 6 | 5, 2, 3 | #P_psrlmod | |- ( ph -> ( I mPwSer R ) e. LMod ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqidd | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) = ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 1, 4 | #P_opsrbas | |- ( ph -> ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) = ( Base ` O ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 1, 4 | #P_opsrplusg | |- ( ph -> ( +g ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) = ( +g ` O ) ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_oveqdr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) /\ y e. ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` O ) y ) ) |
| 11 | 5, 2, 3 | #P_psrsca | |- ( ph -> R = ( Scalar ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) ) |
| 12 | 5, 1, 4, 2, 3 | #P_opsrsca | |- ( ph -> R = ( Scalar ` O ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 14 | 5, 1, 4 | #P_opsrvsca | |- ( ph -> ( .s ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) = ( .s ` O ) ) |
| 15 | 14 | #P_oveqdr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. ( Base ` R ) /\ y e. ( Base ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) ) ) -> ( x ( .s ` ( I mPwSer R ) ) y ) = ( x ( .s ` O ) y ) ) |
| 16 | 7, 8, 10, 11, 12, 13, 15 | #P_lmodpropd | |- ( ph -> ( ( I mPwSer R ) e. LMod <-> O e. LMod ) ) |
| 17 | 6, 16 | #P_mpbid | |- ( ph -> O e. LMod ) |
